body_html:
You could try compiling from source with compute capability 2.1 specified as the required version. However, I believe from this stackoverflow post, you need at least compute capability 3.0 to use cudnn.
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/33760192/how-to-know-which-cudnn-version-one-should-use
@zheng-xq, can you verify that tensorflow requires at least 3.0?
